summary: Darker versions of all the clothing items I could find.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] Darker, less shiny versions of all the clothing items I could find and hadn't already edited. These are not re-textures or anything fancy, just good old vanilla assets edited more to my personal tastes.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Sets Edited :[/b][/color] Bandages, barkeep, beggar, blacksmith, chef, children, emperor, executioner + hood, farm, fine, gag, merchant, miner, mourner, redguard, wedding dress, wench, yarls, simple vampire clothes.[b] Dragonborn[/b] : cultist, dark elf, miraak, skaal, telvanni, temple.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Resolution & Quality :[/b][/color] All of these textures are the same resolution of either the vanilla textures or (if available) the bethesda hd pack versions. I edited them in 16bit per channel color depth then ran them through ddsopt, converting them to the normal dxt5 etc lossy compression. Normally I release the lossless versions as well but given the amount of textures edited here and the fact that nearly all of them will only be worn by npcs I felt maybe there wouldn't be much point this time. If anyone wants the lossless set / just lossless versions of a particular outfit, leave a comment :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] You can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] [/b]I use an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url], alongside hundreds of other mods :P



[center][b](: More Spooky Edits :)[/b]
